name: Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Scrub, Exfoliating Body Wash for Smoother, Healthier Looking Skin, Soothing Prebiotic Oat Formula, Sulfate-Free, Soap-Free & Dye-Free, 8 oz
short_description: 8-ounce tube of Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Scrub gently exfoliates and removes dead skin for smoother, healthier looking skin in just one week
The natural exfoliant works to gently exfoliate dead surface layers for smoother skin, while soothing prebiotic oat formula leaves skin feeling nourished
This gentle body scrub is lightly scented, features a formula made with prebiotic oat and is free of sulfates, parabens, dyes, and soaps
To use, squeeze body scrub onto a wet washcloth or hands, work into a rich, creamy lather and rinse. Use 3-4 times per week for smoother skin
From the dermatologist-recommended brand for over 70 years, Aveeno uses the goodness of nature and the power of science to keep skin healthy and balanced
product_description: Gently exfoliate and remove dead skin with Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Scrub. This exfoliating body scrub from a dermatologist-recommended skin care brand for over 70 years works to exfoliate dead surface layers for smoother, healthier looking skin in just one week. Formulated with prebiotic oat to leave skin feeling nourished, the lightly scented, body scrub with moisturizing ingredients is soap-, sulfate-, paraben-, and dye-free. To use, squeeze the body scrub onto a wet washcloth or hands, work into a rich, creamy lather, and rinse. For results, use 3-4 times per week.

name: Tree Hut Vanilla Shea Sugar Exfoliating & Hydrating Body Scrub, 18 oz
short_description: VANILLA SUGAR SCRUB: America's #1 Body Scrub Brand* exfoliates to remove dull, dead skin to reveal soft, smooth skin; Indulge in the smooth scent of creamy vanilla bean with key notes of warm sandalwood and coconut cream

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: Formulated with real Sugar, Shea Butter, Vanilla, Colloidal Gold, and a blend of natural oils like Avocado, Macadamia, Sweet Orange, Sweet Almond, Evening Primrose, and Safflower Oils

RESTORE SKIN'S NATURAL GLOW: Sugar is a natural exfoliant that effectively polishes away dead skin while helping boost circulation to skin's surface; Vanilla helps calm and soothe skin; Colloidal Gold helps give the appearance of plump skin

NOURISH AND SOFTEN DRY SKIN: Shea Butter helps deeply moisturize and soften dry skin while helping promote skin elasticity; A blend of natural oils conditions skin to help prevent dryness and balance skin hydration for glowing skin

ELEVATE YOUR SHOWER ROUTINE: Alcohol-free, formaldehyde-free, gluten-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, and vegan; Perfect for all skin types and ideal for prepping skin before shaving, tanning, or restoring youthful shine
product_description: Scrub away the day and reveal soft, glowing skin with our Tree Hut Vanilla Shea Sugar Scrub! Made with real Sugar, Shea Butter, Vanilla, Colloidal Gold, and a blend of six natural oils, this body scrub deeply nourishes and balances skin's hydration to help restore skin's natural glow. The thoughtful ingredients work together to hydrate, renew, and smooth skin while removing dull, dry skin. Plus, our Vanilla scent smells of smooth and creamy vanilla bean with key notes of warm sandalwood and coconut cream. Tree Hut Shea Sugar Body Scrubs are formaldehyde-free, gluten-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, and vegan. Apply a generous amount to damp or dry skin, buff in circular motions, and rinse well for skin that feels refreshed, smooth, and radiant. Tree Hut believes that everyone deserves to take time in their day to feel good, even if it's just in the shower or bath. From our Shea Sugar Scrubs and Body Lotions to our Fragrance Mists and Body Washes, we craft delicious and delightful beauty products with exceptional quality. *Naterra calculation based in part on data reported by NIQ through its Syndicated Database service for the Exfoliator/Scrubs category for the latest 52 wks ending 11.02.2024. name: Naturium KP Body Scrub & Mask for Keratosis Pilaris, Bump Eraser Shower Scrub & Exfoliator for Skin, 8 oz
short_description: IMPROVING TONE & TEXTURE: Our 3-in-1 KP body scrub exfoliant instantly transforms bumpy, dry, rough, and dull skin. It works to loosen, lift, & dissolve dead skin cells and clear pores
CONCENTRATED, POWERFUL FORMULA: Our scrub & mask formula is developed with pumice & jojoba esters, plus AHA/BHA/PHA chemical exfoliants, and works to grip, polish, and smooth skin

MOST SKIN TYPES: Perfect for dry, aging, sensitive and combination skin 1-2 times per week as an in-shower treatment. Apply onto wet skin, gently massage with fingertips, and rinse after a few minutes. A patch test is advised prior to use

PROUDLY FORMULATED: All of our products are formulated to be pH level appropriate, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free, Gluten Free, Skin Compatible, & Dermatologist Tested. Most of our skincare is Synthetic Fragrance Free

SKINCARE THAT WORKS: At Naturium, we are committed to providing affordable skincare essentials that use only ingredients directly benefiting the skin’s health, which support the integrity and effectiveness of our formulations
product_description: Our 3-in-1 KP body scrub exfoliant instantly transforms bumpy, dry, rough, and dull skin. Formulated with pumice and jojoba esters, plus AHA/BHA/PHA chemical exfoliants, the scrub grips, polishes and smooths skin. Use as a mask for an effective in-shower treatment. Developed for most skin types. What it does Instantly transforms bumpy, dry, rough, and dull skin Works to loosen, lift, & dissolve dead skin cells and clear pores Improves skin texture and tone PH LEVEL: Formula pH Level: 4.25 - 4.75 Our mission is to create clinically-effective, affordable skin care formulated with both potent natural ingredients and advanced synthetic ingredients. Naturium products utilize efficacious levels of active ingredients, are pH level appropriate, and are thoroughly tested for safety. Patch test advised for all products prior to use.

name: Dove Body Scrub Dragon Fruit & Coconut Cream Body Scrub Exfoliates and Deeply Nourishes for Smooth, Radiant Skin 15 oz
short_description: MOISTURE FORMULA: Only Dove Scrubs are created with moisturizing cream to prepare your skin with this pleasant mix of Dragon Fruit & Coconut
POLISH YOUR WAY TO NATURAL CARE: A delightful blend of naturally derived cleansers with no sulfates, nourishing your skin for silky-smooth results
CARE WHILE YOU EXFOLIATE: Massage onto wet skin and rinse before cleaning with your favorite Dove Body Wash or Dove Beauty Bar; Enjoy 3-4 times per week
DOVE CARE GOES BEYOND YOUR SKIN: We deliver our Dove Body Scrub in a recyclable plastic jar made from 100% recycled materials
EXFOLIATING LASTING SMOOTHNESS: This scrub’s pH-balanced whipped texture creates a rich, creamy lather to gently remove dead cells & reveal a new layer of beautiful, radiant skin
product_description: There’s one essential step for achieving smooth skin that shouldn’t be overlooked: exfoliation. So, gently buff away dry, dull skin while caring for your skin with Dove Dragon Fruit and Coconut Exfoliating Body Scrub. Made with moisturizing cream, this gentle exfoliating body scrub restores skin’s nutrients as it exfoliates, leaving your skin feeling silky smooth. With a smooth, easily spreadable texture, this Dove body exfoliator gives you beautifully creamy coverage while releasing a gently herbal and floral hypoallergenic fragrance. Get all the effectiveness you’d look for in exfoliators or a shower scrub, but with the nourishment and care that your skin needs in the shower. To use, scoop a generous amount of Dove Dragon Fruit and Coconut Exfoliating Body Scrub out of the jar. Massage all over your body in circular motions for creamy coverage, and then rinse away to reveal silky smooth skin. Use 3-4 times per week as part of your skin care regimen, followed by Dove Body Wash or Beauty Bar for touchably soft skin. Try Dove Body Scrub to get beach-ready skin, prep skin for tanning, or to help exfoliate before shaving to help prevent ingrown hairs. You'll love the feeling of silky smooth skin all over. Plus, when you buy Dove, you can be assured you’re caring for your skin with products that are PETA Cruelty-Free certified. Company-wide, we’re also on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look—reaching over a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030. We’re also committed to substantially reducing plastic waste by 2025. This includes reducing our use of virgin plastic by 20,500 metric tons annually, launching new 100% recycled plastic bottles and trialing new refillable formats for certain select products.

name: DOVE MEN + CARE Body and Face Scrub Eucalyptus Deeply Exfoliates for Hydrated & Nourished Skin 100% Gentle Cleanser, No Sulfate Cleansers or Parabens 9 oz
short_description: SCRUB. CLEANSE. MOISTURIZE. Our scrub delivers gentle and thorough exfoliation, cleansing deeply to remove dead, dry skin and wash away dirt and grime. Leaves skin hydrated and nourished.
SOOTHING SCENT: This uplifting fragrance features cooling notes of Blue Eucalyptus blended with a crisp mix of Pine and Mint.

GIVE YOUR SKIN A BOOST: Men’s skincare is different. Men sweat more, have thicker skin and lose hydration faster. Dove Men+Care is specifically developed for men’s skin to protect it against skin dryness.
CARE WHILE YOU EXFOLIATE: Apply to face and body. Massage onto wet skin and rinse. For best results, use this scrub 3-5 times per week. Follow with Dove Men+Care body wash to lock in moisture.
Our body and face scrubs are Peta-approved and Vegan. Globally, Dove Men+Care does not test on animals.
product_description: Give your skin a boost with Dove Men+Care Eucalyptus + Cedar Oil Body and Face Scrub. This all-in-one body and face scrub delivers gentle and thorough exfoliation, cleansing deeply to remove dead, dry skin and wash away dirt and grime. Made with natural essential oils and plant-based moisturizers, this gentle scrub gives you a relaxing and restoring experience in your daily cleansing ritual. This scrub is engineered for men, with an aromatic blend of natural essential oils with crisp notes of Eucalyptus blended with woody notes of Cedar Oil to relax the senses. Featuring a Paraben Free formula with Sulfate-free Cleansers, this scrub not only provides care for your skin, but also for the planet. Our Scrub is also Peta-approved and Vegan. Globally, Dove does not test on animals. Complete your routine with the entire Dove Men + Care line inspired by Nature – available in Body Wash, Cleansing Bar, Deodorant, and Scrubs, all from the #1 Dermatologist Recommended Brand. *92% of our formula is naturally derived, meaning its ingredients are unchanged from nature or after going through processing maintains more than 50% of its original content. This includes water and ingredients from plant, mineral and fermentation sources. We consider our bodywash to be plant powered because our cleansing and moisturizing ingredients are naturally derived, but all start from a plant source.

name: Neutrogena Body Clear Acne Body Scrub, Exfoliating Non-Comedogenic Cleanser, Salicylic Acid 2% Daily Wash Acne Medicine Treatment for Back, Chest & Shoulders, Microbead-Free, 8.5 Fl Oz
short_description: Body scrub with 2% salicylic acid: Exfoliating body scrub treats and helps prevent acne on back, chest, and shoulders; Cleans deep into pores for clear, healthy-looking skin without clogging pores
Exfoliating body wash for acne: Salicylic acid body wash gently sweeps away dead skin and impurities; Non-comedogenic and suitable for daily use on all skin types, including acne-prone skin
Aloe and chamomile infusion: Body exfoliator smoothes and refreshes skin while exfoliating; Dermatologist tested and fragrance-free formula is a gentle body scrub suitable for both women and men
No plastic microbeads: Exfoliating body scrub rinses clean without residue and leaves skin feeling refreshed, smooth, and clear after every wash for a revitalizing shower experience
Targeted acne treatment: Salicylic acid body wash is designed for back, chest, and shoulders; Non-comedogenic and dermatologist tested for effective daily acne care and prevention
product_description: Neutrogena Body Clear Acne Body Scrub with 2% salicylic acid acne medication is a combined exfoliating body scrub and salicylic acid body wash designed to help treat and prevent body acne breakouts on the back, chest, and shoulders. This dual-action body exfoliator combines proven acne-fighting salicylic acid and exfoliating beads to sweep away dead skin, cleanse deep into pores, and help keep skin clear and smooth. The oil-free, non-comedogenic formula is suitable for daily use on acne-prone skin and all skin types, rinsing clean without leaving pore-clogging residue. Free of plastic microbeads, this exfoliating body wash features a foaming lather and contains soothing aloe and chamomile. As a body scrub that contains salicylic acid, it offers a unique two-in-one solution for those seeking an effective exfoliating scrub and acne treatment in one step. Ideal for use on the back, chest, and shoulders, this body scrub is designed to support a consistent body care routine and is suitable for daily use. Packaged in an 8.5 fl.oz. bottle, Neutrogena Body Clear Oil-Free Acne Body Scrub is a trusted choice for those looking for an exfoliating body scrub, salicylic acid body wash, or body exfoliator to help maintain clear, healthy-looking skin. This exfoliating body scrub is formulated for those who want to address body breakouts while also enjoying the benefits of a gentle exfoliating scrub. This formula treats and helps prevent future breakouts and supports smoother, clearer skin with every wash. Suitable for body scrubs for women and men, this product fits seamlessly into any skin care or body care routine. Experience the benefits of a dermatologist-recommended brand with a body scrub that delivers both exfoliation and targeted acne treatment, making it an essential addition to your personal care products for self care and beauty.

product_description: Gently exfoliate and nourish skin with OGX Sensitive+ Rose Water & Pink Sea Salt Body Wash & Scrub, featuring calming rosewater and lightly buffing sea salt. This liquid exfoliating body soap is a lightweight scrub that foams into a rich lather and rinses to lightly exfoliate and soften skin while awakening your senses. Especially kind to sensitive skin, this rose water exfoliating body scrub features calming rosewater, rose quartz, and gently exfoliating pink sea salt. This softening, lightweight, hydrating shower gel for women is proudly formulated without sulfated surfactants. To use as a part of your daily shower routine, massage the sea salt body scrub generously all over wet skin into a rich lather. Concentrate the scrub on areas needing exfoliation and then rinse.
